p: About 20 to 50% of death cases involving liver and kidney failure due to YFV is a significant high rate that should not be ignored. Additionally, renal supportive and palliative care procedures have high costs, and can compromise the health of patients living in developing countries since it will further burden the health budget of these countries. That makes this disease even more frightening than it could be, if the correct and early diagnosis, treatment and preventive measures are not adequately applied and are overlooked.
